about_the_game:
Jiu Feng is back with new and exciting weapons suitable for both aspiring and experienced heisters. This time, Jiu Feng offers a pistol, a shotgun and a new SMG each bringing with them new weapon mods. In addition, 4 new weapon colors with which to customize your favorite guns.

Exclusive Weapon sets

Exclusive Weapon sets are a way for us to add a little something to our weapons while letting our weapon artists flex their skills.
New for this shipment, Jiu Feng also included his custom setup for the Wasp-DS SMG and the Argos III Shotgun, these kits provide the same weapons that you’d usually get - but with a fresh new look and setup to spice up your choices. With just a single click, you can have a badass alternate form of the weapons you already love, fully modded and ready for action.

The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack 4 includes
  • The Argos III Shotgun
  • The Wasp-DS SMG
  • The Gecko M2 Pistol
  • 9 weapon mods
  • 4 weapon colors
  • Two Exclusive Weapon Sets, one each for the shotgun and the SMG

Jiu Feng is back with new and exciting weapons suitable for both aspiring and experienced heisters. This time, Jiu Feng offers a pistol, a shotgun and a new SMG each bringing with them new weapon mods. In addition, 4 new weapon colors with which to customize your favorite guns.

Exclusive Weapon sets are a way for us to add a little something to our weapons while letting our weapon artists flex their skills.
New for this shipment, Jiu Feng also included his custom setup for the Wasp-DS SMG and the Argos III Shotgun, these kits provide the same weapons that you’d usually get - but with a fresh new look and setup to spice up your choices. With just a single click, you can have a badass alternate form of the weapons you already love, fully modded and ready for action.
